Gareth Jones is a senior clinical lecturer and consultant knee surgeon at Imperial College. He has a background in optimising the treatment of knee osteoarthritis, with a number of publications exploring the use of AI to triage patients and predict osteoarthritis progression, determine surgical treatment options, and analyse outcomes.
